column1: Oh, I think they're Faith Hilling, Bobby. It's a little before your time.
Nichole? Your mother tells me that you already have a boyfriend at school.
Well that's good. But... your mother tells me that this boy is... black.

Well, Nichole, it's just... You know, just because you're black doesn't mean you can only date black boys. It's just a little weird that we moved to this whole new place and you're immediately drawn to the one other black person.
You're making a mistake!  Let me go! It wasn't me, I tell ya! A burglar broke in! He was black! He's the one who stabbed that nagging bitch in her fat face! He was blaaack!
In the dining room Michael! Let's go!  Have a seat, son.  Your mom and I have decided you're going to go away for a little while.
We've been put in touch with this camp for troubled kids like you and-
This is the oddest holiday special I've ever seen.
What the heck?
This damn TV! What is that window doing outside the holiday special?!
Yeah, we've got a commenter window in our living room. How do I get rid of that?
Your mom and I are going out for a few weeks, Kenny. Take care of the baby.
You have to share your room with the baby!
The baby!
Okay, my turn.  Ooo, five!  One two three four five. Uh, awww, lost yor mortgage, pay ten thousand dollars! Oh no!
Hi Stan!
Well, it's great you could join us for Family Home Evening, Stan!
Hey kids! Why don't you grab your instruments and play a song for Stan!
Oh boy! Who is the best Mom in the world??
All right, kids, now how about we do some Scripture readings! From the Book of Mormon!
All right, you rascals. Gather round.  Joseph Smith lived in a little American town in the early 1800s.
And we all know what happened then, don't we?
Hey gang, let's wrap some more of them up in plastic wrap and hand them out to the poor!
Awww, that's too bad. Well, it was really nice meeting you, Stan.
Jimmy?
Jim, it's your father!
Jimmy, were you masturbating?
Okay. Well, you have a visitor.
I didn't know you had a girlfriend, Jim.
I'll leave you two alone.  Y-You sure you weren't masturbating, Jim? It's okay if you were.
Okay, then.
Hi, sweetie. What's the matter?
Oh?
...Gosh.
Well, we'll get right on fixing that, sweetie. Wanna watch The Price is Right?
What?! No daughter of mine is going to dress like a whore! We're marching down to that store right now, young lady!
